pr_title: Reduce log verbosity when running tests

timeline.message:
Reduce log verbosity when running tests

Test output is limited and this prevents seeing the root cause

timeline.bodyText: Yeah I considered this during #708. For some tests it is actually important to follow the details of pod calculation and so on. But, we can readd finer-level logging on particular classes to particular tests as we find it useful.
timeline.author: jglick
